name: Shifters (minatozakisana)
description:
Don't get caught

Enable fulllscreen mode and audio for the full recommended immersion || The game is also downloadable for the best experience possible

DESCRIPTION     

Shifters is a mini horror side scroller game inspired by Layers of Fear and the perpetual insanity of its developers. The project was created for our Game Programming course's final examinations.

CREDITS

  • Christopher Fendika Lee (Programmer & Designer)
  • I Putu Raka Natha Nugraha (Artist)
  • Yusuf Oktavianus Supratman Handoko (Sound & Designer)
